      • increaseFlux

        boolean increaseFlux(float fluxAmount,
                   boolean hardFlux)
        Parameters:
        fluxAmount -
        hardFlux -
        Returns:
        false if flux couldn't be raised successfully. Hard flux increases always return true and can overload the ship.
